title: Global Macro and Bitcoin with Nik Bhatia: Episode 10
description: Will Clemente discusses global macro and Bitcoin with Nik Bhatia for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!  Nik's Twitter: twitter.com/timevalueofbtc
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
